sources.title: 1999 - Treasure Island - Starring Jack Palance - Inspired by the R. L. Stevenson story
sources.description:
X marks the spot for treachery and adventure in this high-seas hunt for hidden gold!
Young Jim Hawkins discovers a map to Captain Flint's legendary treasure and joins a voyage to retrieve it. But when the charming cook Long John Silver leads the crew in a shocking betrayal, Jim must outsmart the pirates to survive.

Treasure Island (1999) | AKA: La isla del tesoro

STARRING
Jack Palance - Long John Silver 
Kevin Zegers - Jim Hawkins
Christopher Benjamin - Squire Trelawney
Malcolm Stoddard - Captain Smollett
David Robb - Doctor Livesey

CREW CREDITS
Directed and Written by Peter Rowe (The Arrow, The Hound of the Baskervilles)
based on Robert Louis Stevenson's novel
Cinematography by Marc Charlebois (The Hound of the Baskervilles)

WHY WATCH?
Iconic Villainy: Jack Palance ‚Äî a performance both charming and chilling! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è
A swashbuckling tale of courage and cunning that's perfect for all ages! 
Shot on the rugged Isle of Man, bringing Stevenson's pirate epic to life

metadata.Plot: Enchanted by the idea of locating treasure buried by Captain Flint, Squire Trelawney, Dr. Livesey and Jim Hawkins charter a sailing voyage to a Caribbean island. Unfortunately, a large number of Flint's old pirate crew are aboard the ship, including Long John Silver.
metadata.Writer: Lawrence Edward Watkin, Robert Louis Stevenson
metadata.Actors: Bobby Driscoll, Robert Newton, Basil Sydney
